text: Haley Elizabeth Reinhart (born September 9, 1990) is an American singer-songwriter and actress. She is known for placing third in the tenth season of American Idol. In July 2011, Reinhart signed a recording deal with Interscope Records.Stransky, Tanner. (July 26, 2011) Haley Reinhart signed to Interscope Records | The Music Mix | EW.com . Music-mix.ew.com. Retrieved on October 2, 2011. Her debut album Listen Up! was released on May 22, 2012. She became the first American Idol alumna to perform at Lollapalooza. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:American pop singers Category:American rock singers Category:American jazz singers Category:American blues singers Category:American soul singers Category:American R&B; singers Category:American funk singers Category:American voice actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Singer-songwriters from Chicago
title: Haley Reinhart
